comment.author: 김경용
comment.content: Any other day except the next Friday? Because I will be off that day so. In next week, I am OK from Monday through Thursday.

post.content:
I'm leaving downtown soon after 2 weeks. Why not get together again and have lunch?
How is Friday next week?
The next one begins 15th and the place is around 16th and Woodbine where I used to live, FYI.
post.title: DT lunch?
